normalized_lines: 1/2 teaspoon dried herbs (such as herbs de provence or dried oregano)
Season the chicken with the juice of 1/2 of the lemon, then season with remaining spices on both sides.
Rub the seasoning well all over the chicken then transfer to the air fryer, skin side down.
Air fry 400F 12 minutes on each side, until golden and crispy and cooked through in the center.

target_recipe.title: Air Fryer Chicken Thighs
ingredients: 1/2 teaspoon dried herbs (such as herbs de provence or dried oregano)
steps: Season the chicken with the juice of 1/2 of the lemon, then season with remaining spices on both sides.
Rub the seasoning well all over the chicken then transfer to the air fryer, skin side down.
Air fry 400F 12 minutes on each side, until golden and crispy and cooked through in the center.
